Title: [E1] Trust Component Type Definitions
Description: As a developer, I need TypeScript interfaces for the enhanced trust scoring system.
Acceptance Criteria: TrustComponents interface; ComponentScore interface; EnhancedTrustScore interface; TrustTier type; Types exported; JSDoc comments

Title: [E1] Decision Accuracy Calculator
Description: As the trust system, I need to calculate decision accuracy from task approval rates.
Acceptance Criteria: Query 90-day task history; Calculate approval rate; Risk-adjusted weighting; Return ComponentScore; Handle 0 tasks edge case; Confidence at 100+ samples

Title: [E1] Ethics Compliance Calculator
Description: As the trust system, I need to calculate ethics compliance from violations.
Acceptance Criteria: Query violations 90-day; Query escalations 90-day; Start 100 deduct 10/5; Floor at 0; Return ComponentScore; Integrate SecurityLayer

Title: [E1] Task Success Calculator
Description: As the trust system, I need to calculate task success rate.
Acceptance Criteria: Query completed tasks; Query failed tasks; Calculate ratio; Handle 0 tasks; Return ComponentScore; Use PersistenceLayer

Title: [E1] Operational Stability Calculator
Description: As the trust system, I need to calculate operational stability.
Acceptance Criteria: Query error count; Query response time; Error penalty -5 max -50; Response penalty; Floor at 0; Return ComponentScore

Title: [E1] Peer Reviews Calculator
Description: As the trust system, I need to calculate peer reviews from Blackboard.
Acceptance Criteria: Query contributions; Count endorsements; Count solutions; Score formula capped 100; Return ComponentScore; Integrate Blackboard

Title: [E1] Weighted Score Aggregation
Description: As the trust system, I need to aggregate scores with weighting.
Acceptance Criteria: Apply 35/25/20/15/5 weights; Calculate weighted sum; Scale 300-1000; Apply inheritance; Apply penalties; Derive tier; Calculate trend

Title: [E1] TrustEngine Integration
Description: As the trust system, I need to integrate TrustScoreCalculator.
Acceptance Criteria: Feature flag USE_FICO_SCORING; Inject calculator; Modify createTrust; Modify reward/penalize; Preserve inheritance; Emit events; Backward compat

Title: [E2] Audit Entry Type Definitions
Description: As a developer, I need TypeScript interfaces for cryptographic audit.
Acceptance Criteria: CryptographicAuditEntry extends; sequenceNumber field; previousHash field; entryHash field; merkleRoot optional; AuditChainStatus interface

Title: [E2] Hash Computation Module
Description: As the audit system, I need reliable hash computation.
Acceptance Criteria: Use crypto SHA-256; Deterministic JSON; Exclude entryHash; Handle Dates ISO; Handle null; Return 64 char hex

Title: [E2] Chain-Linked Entry Logging
Description: As the audit system, I need chain-linked entries.
Acceptance Criteria: First entry GENESIS; Subsequent use previous hash; Increment sequence; Compute entryHash; Persist immediately; Return entry; Emit event

Title: [E2] Chain Verification
Description: As a compliance officer, I need to verify chain integrity.
Acceptance Criteria: Verify any range; Check previousHash matches; Recompute and verify; Return AuditChainStatus; Identify break point; Handle missing entries

Title: [E2] Compliance Export
Description: As a compliance officer, I need to export audit logs.
Acceptance Criteria: Export by date range; JSON includes status; CSV format; Include metadata; Sign export optional; Stream large exports

Title: [E2] SecurityLayer Integration
Description: As the security system, I need to integrate cryptographic audit.
Acceptance Criteria: Feature flag USE_CRYPTO_AUDIT; Inject logger; Replace logAudit calls; Migrate existing; Preserve queries; Add verifyChain; Backward compat

Title: [E3] Council Type Definitions
Description: As a developer, I need TypeScript interfaces for council.
Acceptance Criteria: CouncilMember interface; CouncilReview interface; CouncilVote interface; Precedent interface; Request types enum; Status types enum

Title: [E3] Council Member Management
Description: As the council system, I need to manage membership.
Acceptance Criteria: Only T4+ members; Register member; Unregister member; List members; Track activeReviews max 3; Auto-unregister on tier drop; Emit events

Title: [E3] Reviewer Selection Algorithm
Description: As the council system, I need to select reviewers.
Acceptance Criteria: Select 3 reviewers; Exclude requester; Prefer < 3 active; Prefer diverse; Weight T5 higher; Fallback any T4+; Fail if < 3

Title: [E3] Review Submission
Description: As an agent, I need to submit for review.
Acceptance Criteria: Create review with ID timestamp expiry; Select reviewers; Increment activeReviews; Persist; Notify via MessageBus; Return pending; Log audit

Title: [E3] Voting Mechanism
Description: As a council member, I need to vote.
Acceptance Criteria: Only assigned can vote; Options approve reject abstain; Reasoning required; Cannot vote decided; Cannot change vote; Persist immediately; Emit event

Title: [E3] Decision Resolution
Description: As the council, I need to resolve reviews.
Acceptance Criteria: 2/3 approve = approved; 2/3 reject = rejected; Timeout = escalate; Synthesize reasoning; Update status; Decrement activeReviews; Notify requester

Title: [E3] Precedent Service
Description: As the council, I need precedent management.
Acceptance Criteria: Create from decision; Store patterns; Calculate similarity; Auto-apply > 0.9; Reference in decision; Allow override; Persist across restarts

Title: [E3] HITL Gateway Integration
Description: As governance, I need council routing.
Acceptance Criteria: HITL >= 50% = human; HITL < 50% = council; EMERGENCY = human; Timeout = escalate; Map types; Await decision; Feature flag USE_COUNCIL

Title: [E4] Delegation Type Definitions
Description: As a developer, I need delegation interfaces.
Acceptance Criteria: DelegationRequest interface; ActiveDelegation interface; Status types; Permission types; Duration in ms; Types exported

Title: [E4] Delegation Request Creation
Description: As an agent, I need to request capabilities.
Acceptance Criteria: Create with caps reason duration; Validate capabilities; Validate duration max 24h; Attach track record; Count similar approvals; Persist; Log audit

Title: [E4] Auto-Approval Logic
Description: As high-trust agent, I need auto-approval.
Acceptance Criteria: Auto if T4+ 90% 3+ 1h no-restricted; Create ActiveDelegation; Set expiry; Log audit; Emit event

Title: [E4] Delegation Approval Routing
Description: As delegation system, I need approval routing.
Acceptance Criteria: Route to council or human; HITL >= 50% = human; HITL < 50% = council; Await decision; Create on approval; Mark rejected; Notify requester

Title: [E4] Active Delegation Management
Description: As delegation system, I need to manage active.
Acceptance Criteria: Store per agent; Check expiry; Remove expired; Allow revocation; checkCapability includes; List for agent; Emit events

Title: [E4] Autonomy Budget Types
Description: As a developer, I need budget interfaces.
Acceptance Criteria: DailyBudget interface; BudgetAction interface; TierBudgets const; T5 unlimited -1; Types exported

Title: [E4] Budget Creation & Reset
Description: As autonomy system, I need budget lifecycle.
Acceptance Criteria: Create if not exists; Set limits by tier; Reset midnight UTC; Preserve history; Handle tier changes; Persist; Emit reset event

Title: [E4] Budget Enforcement
Description: As autonomy system, I need enforcement.
Acceptance Criteria: canPerformAction checks; Return allowed/reason; Return remaining; recordAction increments; T5 always allowed; Track actions; Emit events

Title: [E5] Trust Component Endpoints
Description: As API consumer, I need trust component endpoints.
Acceptance Criteria: GET /trust/:id/components; Response includes all; GET history with days; Daily snapshots; Requires T2+; 404 if not found

Title: [E5] Audit Verification Endpoints
Description: As compliance officer, I need audit endpoints.
Acceptance Criteria: GET /audit/verify; Return AuditChainStatus; GET /audit/export JSON CSV; Include status; HUMAN token only; Stream large

Title: [E5] Council Endpoints
Description: As council member, I need council endpoints.
Acceptance Criteria: GET /council/reviews; GET detail; POST vote; GET members; T4+ for voting; Appropriate errors

Title: [E5] Delegation & Budget Endpoints
Description: As agent/operator, I need delegation endpoints.
Acceptance Criteria: POST request; GET active; DELETE revoke; GET budget; POST action; Appropriate auth

Title: [E5] Trust Score Gauge Component
Description: As user, I need trust gauge visual.
Acceptance Criteria: Circular 300-1000; Color gradient; Tier badge center; Trend arrow; Hover breakdown; Animate change; Responsive

Title: [E5] Component Breakdown Panel
Description: As user, I need component breakdown.
Acceptance Criteria: Bar chart 5 components; Labeled bars; Raw and weight; Color coded; Confidence indicator; Tooltip details

Title: [E5] Council Review Panel
Description: As council member, I need review panel.
Acceptance Criteria: Pending reviews list; Card with type requester; Expandable detail; Vote buttons; Reasoning required; Confidence slider; Show votes; Auto-refresh

Title: [E5] Delegation Request Modal
Description: As operator, I need delegation modal.
Acceptance Criteria: Modal from detail; Capability checklist; Reason field; Duration selector; Show eligibility; Loading state; Feedback

Title: [E5] Autonomy Budget Widget
Description: As user, I need budget widget.
Acceptance Criteria: Progress bar; Percentage label; Reset countdown; Color depletes; Tooltip tier limits; Real-time update

Title: [E5] Dashboard Integration
Description: As user, I need integrated dashboard.
Acceptance Criteria: Gauge in agent cards; Breakdown in modal; Council sidebar T4+; Budget in cards; Delegation button; Audit footer; 30s refresh
